mapper.update: update tb_content set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, category_id, title, url, pic, status, sort_order from tb_content
